heading: HR02468
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING ON HIS EXCELLENCY, PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO ADDRESS THE RECRUITMENT BY THE NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY (NPA) OF MEMBERS OF INDIGENOUS CULTURAL COMMUNITIES/INDIGENOUS PEOPLE'S (ICCs/IPs), AND BY SPECIFICALLY INCLUDING THE IP CONCERN IN HIS ADMINISTRATION'S ZERO TO 10-POINT SOCIO-ECONOMIC AGENDA
